name: design-to-code-wasm
description: A set of tooling utilities which has a WASM compile target
author: Jane Chu

scripts.build:permutator: cd src && cd permutator && wasm-pack build
scripts.test:permutator:web: cd src && cd permutator && wasm-pack test --headless --firefox
scripts.test:permutator: cd src && cd permutator && cargo test
